directions: Stir peanut butter and chocolate-hazelnut spread together in a bowl; transfer dip to a serving bowl. Sprinkle crushed cereal squares over dip. Dip pretzel rods into dip to make 'broomsticks'.
ingredients: 1/2 cup oatmeal cereal squares (such as Quaker® Oatmeal Squares), crushed
title: Broomstick Dip
